entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
